metadata.title: CVE-2024-26977 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pci_iounmap(): Fix MMIO mapping leakThe #ifdef ARCH_HAS_GENERIC_IOPORT_MAP accidentally also guards iounmap(),which means MMIO mappings are leaked.Move the guard so we call iounmap() for MMIO mappings.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
